meta.description: Portfolio of Jose David Rodriguez Betancor, a passionate frontend web developer dedicated to creating innovative and functional digital solutions.

header.title: Hi, I'm
header.subtitle: A passionate web developer, eager to learn and contribute my knowledge and skills by creating solutions to digitize businesses and ideas.

marketec360.title: Frontend Developer
marketec360.description: Frontend developer at Marketec360, where I worked on developing web applications using modern technologies like React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. I collaborated on large-scale projects, improving user experience and designing responsive and accessible interfaces.

searching.title: Seeking new opportunities
searching.description: I am currently seeking new job opportunities where I can apply my skills and continue growing professionally. I am open to challenging projects that allow me to learn and contribute to the success of the team.

gymtinajo.title: Tinajo Gym
gymtinajo.description: This project is a website dedicated to booking gym classes, handling both client and admin interfaces. It allows client registration and the management of bookings and news or announcements from the organization.

weatherApp.title: Weather App
weatherApp.description: A web application that shows the current weather and forecasts using the WeatherApi. Users can search by city and view detailed weather information.

tcgstore.title: TCG Store
tcgstore.description: An online store for trading card games (TCG) developed with NextJs, TypeScript, React, and Tailwind CSS. It includes navigation, search, and product filtering features. For the backend, it uses Clerk for user authentication and Directus as a CMS to manage products and inventory stored in Supabase. Payments are processed via Stripe.

responsiveCertification.title: Responsive Design
responsiveCertification.alt: Certificate in responsive design by FreeCodeCamp

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This privacy policy explains how user information is collected, used, and protected when visiting this website.

section1.title: 1. Information Collected
section1.content: Personal data you provide through the contact form (such as your name and email address). Data automatically collected through tools like Google Analytics (e.g., your IP address, browser, pages visited, and browsing time).

section2.title: 2. Use of Information
section2.content: The collected information is used solely to respond to requests submitted through the form and to improve the user experience on the site.

section3.title: 3. Data Sharing with Third Parties
section3.content: Your personal information is not sold, traded, or shared with third parties, except for the use of analytics services like Google Analytics.

section4.title: 4. Cookies
section4.content: This site may use cookies to collect anonymous statistical data. You can disable cookies in your browser settings.

section5.title: 5. User Rights
section5.content: You have the right to access, rectify, or delete your personal data at any time. To do so, you can write to: [yourmail@example.com]

section6.title: 6. Policy Changes
section6.content: This policy may be updated occasionally. It is recommended to review it regularly.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.intro: By accessing this website, you agree to the following terms and conditions. If you do not agree with any of them, please do not use the site.

section1.title: 1. Intellectual Property
section1.content: All content on this site (texts, images, designs, code, etc.) is the property of the portfolio's author unless otherwise stated. Reproduction without prior authorization is not allowed.

section2.title: 2. Site Usage
section2.content: This site is for informational and professional purposes. It is prohibited to use it for illegal activities or those that infringe the rights of others.

section3.title: 3. External Links
section3.content: The site may contain links to other websites. I am not responsible for the content or privacy policies of those sites.

section4.title: 4. Disclaimer
section4.content: This site is provided "as is", without guarantees of availability, accuracy, or uninterrupted operation.

section5.title: 5. Modifications
section5.content: The terms stated here may change without prior notice. Continued use of the site implies acceptance of such changes.
